Question: King George III called this person "the greatest character of the age" because of this.
Hints: There has been a huge controversy, to put it mildly, about this person's religious beliefs.
This person delivered the letter to the local French commander Jacques Legardeur de Saint-Pierre, who politely refused to leave.
Martha urged this person to advertise a reward for her capture, and the ad was placed in the Pennsylvania Gazette on May 24, 1796.
